explanation: To detect recursion you must inspect all functions that get_param_value calls (and their transitive callees) to see if any path leads back to get_param_value. The static call graph shows get_param_value only calls mhd_tool_str_to_uint. Therefore you need the mhd_tool_str_to_uint symbol (its definition and its callees) to verify it does not call get_param_value (directly or indirectly). The listed callers of get_param_value (process_param__threads, process_param__connections, process_param__timeout, etc.) are callers, not callees, and are not required to prove whether get_param_value calls itself.
